title: Super Galaxy Rumble Junkyard Titan Bug
body: I've Been Playing Super Galaxy Rumble For a long time now and it just recently hit me that during overheat, His Drill doesnt grow big and red like it used too ://// is there a way to fix this bug?

replies.body: Thanks for the report, we'll see what's going on! :D
I mean... better months late than never? Still a pretty low standard though.
LIke how they are outright ignoring the Heimer bugs?

Hey EnderForHegemon,

The fix for this particular bug was a bit different than we had initially thought, and finding a root cause was a bit more complex. 

Sorry about the long wait, but I wanted to keep you guys in the loop that we've finally got a fix for the issue! :] 

Generally speaking (at least in terms of skins), we try to resolve skins issues as quickly as possible, without taking too much time away from new content coming out.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=7OeUZpLw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-06T00:17:51.077+0000)
>
> Cap'n, we've got a fix!

Yo Katey, can I get an ETA on the fix?

This won't be in 5.11, but should be coming shortly after! 

Again, super sorry for the long wait on this!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=7OeUZpLw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-15T22:32:10.253+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report, we'll see what's going on! :D

Hey, from what can I see this bug was reported first time 4 month ago. And right now with 5.4 patch it's still not fixed.

Why are you the only one who'll actually make it so we don't feel so fking ignored?

Why can't you work for the bug department instead of the skin department?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=7OeUZpLw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-15T22:32:10.253+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report, we'll see what's going on! :D

It's still happening since the Trist patch. I hope you guys figure it out. :(
